products.title: Secret Garden Bluegrass Roller Blind
products.description: The secret garden bluegrass roller blind dresses your home in a magical air, so dainty with its colour palette and enchanting with its design. Theres trailing stems decorated with leaves in green and blue, as well as a honeybee or two buzzing around. This blind feels like spr the secret garden bluegrass roller blind dresses your home in a magical air, so dainty with its colour palette and enchanting with its design.

products.title: Gardenia Olivia Roller Blind
products.description: Gardenia is a classic harlequin design, a modern take of the floral classics. Here we have it picked out in greens and greys to add some funk to your surroundings. Not only is the design nice and contemporary, the practicality you get with a roller blind is just perfect for gardenia is a classic harlequin design, a modern take of the floral classics.

products.title: Garden City, Fresh - Roller Blind
products.description: Garden city fresh instantly caught their eye, and with good reason. The homely colours bring any space to life, and are everything you need to approach your decor from a completely different angle. As you take a closer look you'll soon see that it offers a subtle layer of depth you didn't see first time around. We love the idea of using city fresh in the kitchen so that the homely shades and hues can add some inspiration when you're perfecting your next culinary creation.

products.title: Cottage Garden, Rose - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at the vibrancy of the reds on display in cottage garden rose, it's easy to forget the beauty of the understated greens. The lack of a black outline allows you to enjoy each colour in relation to its neighbours, and leaves you with an impression of natural simplicity. We love the idea of using garden rose in the upstairs landing so that you can breathe new life into one of the more hard to decorate parts of the home.

products.title: Garden City, Warm Glow - Roller Blind
products.description: Garden city warm glow allows you to introduce a smattering of hearty tones to your home in just a couple of minutes. The soothing colour spread is perfect when you want to enhance any space, and works particularly well when you want to shed new light on a compact spare bedroom. As well as your new roller blinds, consider smart storage solutions like storage boxes that slide effortless under the bed, a chest of drawers that doubles as a dress, and recessed wardrobe storage.

products.title: The Gardener Fennel Roller Blind
products.description: The gardener fennel roller blind is a wonderful addition to their sanderson home collection, full of their signature country charm and influenced by the great british garden. We particularly love the incredible detail of each watercolour feature, from the spotty wellies to the cu the gardener fennel roller blind is a wonderful addition to their sanderson home collection, full of their signature country charm and influenced by the great british garden.

products.title: Gardenia Inky Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Bright and breezy, the gardenia inky blue roller blind is an absolute gem from their harlequin additions collection. Plus, its a pretty exclusive colourway. The palette consists of a beautiful blue, teal and green, which when together create just enough contrast. The addition bright and breezy, the gardenia inky blue roller blind is an absolute gem from their harlequin additions collection.
